, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Garbha Sanskar means --\nmoulding the mind and personality of the unborn . &nbsp;-- \u201c <i>Sanskaro hi gunaantaradhanam </i>\u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our Vedas a\nchild's mental &nbsp;development starts as\nsoon as he is conceived. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 6000 year old Mahabharata,\n&nbsp;Arjuna\u2019s son Abhimanyu learnt how to\nenter the Chakravyuha while in the womb. &nbsp;Modern science has just woken up to the\nsecrets of the 7000 year old Garbha Upanishad. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Vishnu took an\navatar of Narasimha to kill demon Hiranyakashipu. The story of Prahlad is from\nthe Puranas. &nbsp;Prahlad was born into a\nfamily of demons who were wreaking havoc on the Gods in heaven. &nbsp;His mother listened to devotional prayers and\nstories about Lord Vishnu while he was in her womb. &nbsp;As a result, he became a devotee of Lord\nVishnu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His personality begins\nto take shape in the womb, and this can be influenced by the mother's state of\nmind during pregnancy. &nbsp;&nbsp;The baby feels your feelings even when it is\ndeveloping in your womb, as per our Vedas. &nbsp;Even what you visualize is known by the fetus.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-r1XK9BrHxsk/Ut90lLLVcXI/AAAAAAAApNM/Nv4VOOwsstM/s1600/downFWEFload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are Garbha\nSanskar ragas or Sama Veda Mantras accompanied by soothing sounds of Goddess Saraswati\u2019s\nveena veena or Lord krishna\u2019s flute.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/VeKRX7eC2To/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/VeKRX7eC2To&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/VeKRX7eC2To&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is very important for\na pregnant woman to be stress free , have positive thoughts free of negativity.\nKeep away from negative people.&nbsp; Unhappy\nand fearful &nbsp;hormones warp the child\u2019s\nDNA.&nbsp; &nbsp;A pregnant mother must never ever watch horror\nmovies. &nbsp;One of the great secrets to\nhappiness is to be immersed in an activity which you love.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSupraja janan\u201d, &nbsp;of Ayurveda, involves detoxification of mind\nand body of a would be mother and father &nbsp;&nbsp;three\nmonths prior to conception. &nbsp;For the male\nit increases the quality of his sperm . &nbsp;The\nsperm does NOT like hot places. &nbsp;The man\nmust eat fresh fish if he can.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Garbha Sanskar,\nyour baby is able to sense and respond to outside influences like music and\nother sounds as well as your thoughts and feelings. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pregnant woman must\nNOT have anything around which upsets her.&nbsp;\nSee pictures and albums which will arouse happy memories. &nbsp;Even a pet can raise her feelings\u2014 but NO pet\ninside the bed room.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The woman must do\nPranayama daily. If your baby's deprived of oxygen in the womb, the risk of\npoor growth -- and lower IQ -- increases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doing VIPASSANA meditation\nis good. &nbsp;&nbsp;If the woman can pray it is good for the\nchild. She must make peace with her past --so that she does NOT mar your\npresent.&nbsp; &nbsp;Mothers of retarded children must use their\nhind sight .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She must drink clean\nwater and eat organic foods including folic acid foods \u2013and expose her whole\nbody to sunshine for a brief time.&nbsp; Avoid\nall allergens . &nbsp;Be happy and smile a\nlot. &nbsp;She must be close to nature to take\nin the negative ions .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cook in virgin coconut\noil. &nbsp;Have fresh turmeric in your\ndiet.&nbsp; Do NOR drink toxic A1 humpless cow\nmilk. &nbsp;If A2 milk of humped cow is not\navailable eat only yoghurt.&nbsp; All these\nwill prevent premature birth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There's a strong link between birth weight, IQ\nscore, and school achievement.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mother must ensure her\nbaby is delivered naturally and NOT by caesarian . This is an important aspect\nof Garbha Sanskar which is neglected by all.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I remember my wife\u2019s\nmother used to make her swab the floor of the entire house on her haunches to\nstrengthen her pelvic muscles.&nbsp; &nbsp;Natural delivery children pick up some good bacteria\nand this provided them with immunity from allergens. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kC_zY-odHnU/Ut91Gh5gQkI/AAAAAAAApNU/_5g5rS5W90g/s1600/human+baby+inHYRJ+MothersWomb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caesarian born babies\nlack a specific group of good bacteria, which found in babies delivered\nnaturally, even if they were breastfed. &nbsp;&nbsp;They take longer to accumulate good bugs,\nwhich delays exposure to microbes that kick start the immune system--\nestablishing immunity to allergies later on in life. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babies&nbsp;\nborn by cesarean section are six times more likely to be sensitive to\ndust mite allergens than babies born naturally.&nbsp;\nThe Babies who are born via C-section have a different microbiome in\ntheir gastrointestinal tract.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babies born prematurely\n&nbsp;miss out on the unique nourishment that\nthe placenta provides, are exposed to stimuli they're normally protected from\nin the womb, and are more vulnerable to infection and allergy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She must mentally talk\nand caress her growing baby . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The &nbsp;baby's brain develops up to 60 per cent while\nin the womb. &nbsp;Listen to Sanskrit mantras ,\nwhich prevent the placenta from shrinking.&nbsp;\nShe must read books or watch TV which stimulates positive thinking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The woman must have a\nsense of gratitude to the father of the baby. &nbsp;Timeless rituals like Karva Chaut aid in this.\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There have been calls to eliminate the\nKarva Chauth festival by Western human rights commentators who hold it to be\n\"anti-women\" and to \"perpetuate the notion of women's slavery to\nmen.\"&nbsp; How wrong they are.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grateful wives experience very deepest &nbsp;levels of happiness. &nbsp;She is nurturing her husband\u2019s sperm. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-N-7tnttBCro/Ut91pliMN1I/AAAAAAAApNc/EIhzDjMsGfo/s1600/117431-004-FD5NRI67T91591.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress and negativity\nreleases Cortisol which&nbsp; warps the child\u2019s\nDNA.&nbsp; Cortisol causes reduced growth and\nmodifies the timing of tissue development as well as having long lasting\neffects on gene expression. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Warped DNA can even\ncause gay children ,retarded children or children with NO empathy. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16.363636016845703px;\">Women who wish to be pregnant must be tested for thyroid and make sure she is NOT HYPOthyroid\u2014 or TSH reading more than 3.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16.363636016845703px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An enzyme in the\nplacenta of the mother and the brain of the fetus acts as a barrier to protect\nthe unborn baby from chemicals released in times of stress. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Prolonged negativity causes levels of the\nhormones of the pregnant mother to soar and overwhelm the protective barrier,\nresulting in the child being prone to schizophrenia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Puberty is another\nsensitive time of development and stress experienced at this time can also be\ninvolved in programming adult mood disorders. During puberty children can be\nmolested by gays be initiated to being a gay themselves.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound of mother\u2019s\nheartbeats is the first and nearest sound heard by the fetus and hence when the\nmother takes her crying child close to her the child stops crying and becomes\ncalm. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A homeless woman may\nsleep next to the railway tracks. &nbsp;She\nwill sleep unaware of dozens of trains clattering past, &nbsp;blowing their whistles\u2014 yet when the baby even\nlets out a whimper the mother wakes up to cuddle the baby. &nbsp;This is the meaning of attunement and\nresonance between DNA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fish contain the\nomega-3 fatty acid known as docosahexaenoic acid, or DHA, which is necessary\nfor optimal brain development. &nbsp;Babies\nborn to mothers with a deficiency of DHA develop visual and behavioral defects;\nmothers with high omega-3 intake during pregnancy tend to have children who do\nbetter on tests measuring verbal, social and communication skills during early\nchildhood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
