Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "185", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1762683086069000659/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "2480836074392987990", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2014-01-21T10:20:00+05:30", "updated": "2018-07-11T09:18:05+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTMxMjgwODg1MTMxCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/01/nandi-bull-vahana-and-gatekeeper-of.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2480836074392987990", "title": "NANDI BULL, VAHANA AND GATEKEEPER OF LORD SHIVA - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">NANDI BULL THE GURU OF PATANJALI</span> , &nbsp; <span style=\"color: blue;\">MOSES AND THE GOLDEN BULL</span> , &nbsp; <span style=\"color: purple;\">APIS THE EGYPTIAN BULL DEITY</span>, &nbsp;9000 YEAR OLD NANDI BULL HEADS EXCAVATED FROM CATALHOYUK TURKEY</span></b> - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-n6NmIo3NPAA/Ut38TN7KraI/AAAAAAAApHU/g5aOSJ6GiKw/s1600/dokikugwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"478\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-n6NmIo3NPAA/Ut38TN7KraI/AAAAAAAApHU/g5aOSJ6GiKw/s1600/dokikugwnload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Above: Nandi bull-- one leg is raised depicting that Dharma is one ONE LEG during Kali Yuga</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Few days ago my wife\nwanted to go to a temple and whisper something into the ear of Nandi Bull.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She whispered with intention into one ear .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She has matched more\nthan 40 bridal horoscopes for my elder son , and nothing had worked out. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within 3 hours a call\ncame where the girl had \u201cpurvajanma&nbsp;\nbandham\u201d \u2013 which means as per astrological horoscope the girl was a wife\nin the past to my son. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My own wife was the 123\nrd horoscope my parents matched , and her horoscope too had \u201cpurvajanma bandham\n\u201c\u2014meaning she was my wife in the hoary past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I , my wife and my 2\nsons have \u201c shuddha Jatakam \u201c &nbsp;( pure\nhoroscopes ) \u2013 which means the Karma load balance is negligible, for the entire\nfamily of 4 \u2013 which is rare . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are NIL doshams\nin a Shuddha jatakam.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;Doshas\nare formed by malefic or inauspicious combinations of planets in horoscopes. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AdhcsGoQX7g/Ut5SiI6vXoI/AAAAAAAApL8/W4UY4a5tjMA/s1600/Narendra+Nagar-Nandi+Bull-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AdhcsGoQX7g/Ut5SiI6vXoI/AAAAAAAApL8/W4UY4a5tjMA/s1600/Narendra+Nagar-Nandi+Bull-1.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some wannabe gora\nHindus or Indians of other religions or foreigners may smirk\u2014so be it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My wife then charges\nher hands on the sanctum enclosure granite wall, like how you charge your\nmobile phone battery &nbsp;.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last time she\ndid it 3&nbsp; months ago, her right hand\nbecame numb in less than a minute and she had to remove her hands.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This time she completed\nthe process and when she removed her hands from the stone wall ( inside this inner\nsanctum is the deity ), &nbsp;after two minutes ,&nbsp;she was\nliterally intoxicated with scalar energy absorbed and unsteady on her legs . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We all have seen the\nNandi Bull at the doorway of Kedarnath temple , recently on TV right?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\">Below: Nandi bull facing the doorway at Kedarnath .</span></i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TkZwn0-2fpI/Ut4CBmMylRI/AAAAAAAApHk/slIzZEglIaY/s1600/773(601)posKedarnathTemple1882.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"528\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TkZwn0-2fpI/Ut4CBmMylRI/AAAAAAAApHk/slIzZEglIaY/s1600/773(601)posKedarnathTemple1882.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what is the lore\nbehind whispering into the bull\u2019s ear?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once Lord Shiva was in\ndeep meditation , and a great calamity was about to befall. &nbsp;Everybody tried to shake off Lord Shiva from\nhis deep Turiya meditation\u2014and we unsuccessful. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva\u2019s\nson Ganesha used his initiative and whispered into Nandi\u2019s ear and Shiva was\nwoken up. &nbsp;It shows that Nandi is a medium to reach\nShiva.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uhwFbLlkN_Y/Ut4DlGOQVvI/AAAAAAAApHw/eluLN1kUm2k/s1600/WhyAnimalworsEWGHhipinhinduism7.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uhwFbLlkN_Y/Ut4DlGOQVvI/AAAAAAAApHw/eluLN1kUm2k/s1600/WhyAnimalworsEWGHhipinhinduism7.png\" width=\"580\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today if you look into\nthe internet , free encyclopedias like Wikipedia , and Indophiles ( white men\npretending to be experts on India ) constantly quote Devdutt Pattanaik on\nmatters of Hindu faith.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He has written several\nbooks on Hindu mythology, injecting poison into all of them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is the chief belief\nofficer of Rothschild remote controlled Future Group, one of India\u2019s largest\nretailers and he is also a newspaper columnist .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is also a story\nconsultant to Rothschild agent controlled&nbsp;\nIndian television network Star TV and also Ernst and Young .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Times of India too has\na daily post on Hinduism\u2014all injected with poison.&nbsp; Hey,&nbsp;\nfor a change why don\u2019t they inject some poison into Islam and see how\ntheir heads of the reporter and Editor gets cut off.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Plr6RvswnUU/Ut5SWzT2VJI/AAAAAAAApL0/QRdkeApZMmw/s1600/5516895367_4b4bb1094f.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Plr6RvswnUU/Ut5SWzT2VJI/AAAAAAAApL0/QRdkeApZMmw/s1600/5516895367_4b4bb1094f.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">So let me give an\nexample of what <span style=\"background-color: orange;\">Devdutt Pattanaik</span> has to write about Nandi bull , whom Hindus\nworship.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; He injects poison and allows\nhis readers to put poisonous comments .&nbsp;\nHe will NOT delete them , he has approved all of them.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>ARTICLE -- Published in\nDevlok,&nbsp; Sunday Midday,&nbsp; August 08, 2010</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I recently visited a\nbrand new modern Shiva temple complete with a neon sign post and a billboard.\nThe patron of the temple wanted me to see the USP of his temple: a gigantic\nNandi bull placed in the courtyard facing the main shrine. &nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Nandi is the mount of the hermit-god. &nbsp;The statue made of concrete was an impressive\none. &nbsp;As I walked around it, I asked the\npatron, \u201cIs this a bull or an ox?\u201d \u201cIt is Nandi,\u201d he replied. &nbsp;So I clarified myself, \u201cIs Nandi a bull or an\nox?\u201d &nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>This baffled the patron. &nbsp;It dawned on me he did not know the difference\nbetween a bull and an ox. A true blue\ncity-slicker, with no understanding of animal husbandry practices, he was!<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I had asked the\nquestion as I noticed that the scrotum (the bag of skin containing testicles)\nof the gigantic Nandi bull could not be seen at the back. &nbsp;In any traditional Shiva temple, one is often\nshocked by the importance placed to Nandi\u2019s scrotum. &nbsp;It hangs down prominently and some devotees,\nincluding the priest, make it a point to touch it before entering the shrine of\nShiva.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Modern images of Nandi, made\nusing concrete and marble and plastic and plaster of Paris, shy away from doing\nso. &nbsp;\u201cBecause,\u201d explained one craftsman\nwho I interrogated, \u201cpeople feel embarrassed by it. &nbsp;They find it very vulgar. &nbsp;So we don\u2019t show it anymore. &nbsp;Some even assume Nandi is a cow!\u201d<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>We are becoming an\nincreasingly prudish people. &nbsp;Prudishness\nlaced with ignorance is a dangerous combination. &nbsp;Showing the scrotum of Nandi is critical. &nbsp;The point is not to titillate. &nbsp;The point is to inform all devotees that Nandi\nis male (not a cow) and that he is not castrated (not an ox or steer or\nbullock). &nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>This means he is not\ndomesticated. &nbsp;Nandi cannot be used to\npull ploughs or carts. &nbsp;He is no beast of\nburden. &nbsp;To show Nandi without his\nscrotum is to take away his identity.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When I explained this\nto the temple patron, he came up with an ingenious answer to save face,\n\u201cActually the scrotum is there, hidden under his body.\u201d &nbsp;I smiled as no one can make a bull of concrete\nstand up.<o:p></o:p></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fNEQfI0uO0Q/Ut5SrSpHq4I/AAAAAAAApME/z3KeFJq2Jl0/s1600/DSCN7558_345x460.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fNEQfI0uO0Q/Ut5SrSpHq4I/AAAAAAAApME/z3KeFJq2Jl0/s1600/DSCN7558_345x460.jpg\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>In mythology, Shiva\nrefuses to get married and be a householder. &nbsp;In other words, he refuses to get\ndomesticated. &nbsp;But the Goddess appeals to\nhim to marry her. &nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Unless Shiva\nparticipates in worldly affairs, unless he serves her as a husband, children\ncannot be conceived and the world cannot be created. &nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Shiva reluctantly agrees. &nbsp;He becomes the groom of the Goddess, but he is\nnever the head of her household. &nbsp;He\nlives with her but is not the bread winner. &nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>He fathers children, but is not father to the\nchildren. &nbsp;Shakti becomes the autonomous\nmatriarch. &nbsp;She becomes the cow,\nnourishing the world with her milk. &nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He\nremains independent in spirit, refusing to be fettered by the ways of the\nworld. &nbsp;This aspect of Shiva is what\nNandi portrays as he sits benignly at his master\u2019s doorstep.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">SOURCE:&nbsp;&nbsp; devdutt.com/articles/indian-mythology/its-all-bull.html\u200e</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\"><i>Below : Devdutt Pattanaik.&nbsp;</i></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\"><i><br /></i></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kySjv5ats1g/Ut4NQUvMj5I/AAAAAAAApIU/mnNOW7YMKxo/s1600/downlondnjgtkad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"368\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kySjv5ats1g/Ut4NQUvMj5I/AAAAAAAApIU/mnNOW7YMKxo/s1600/downlondnjgtkad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">COMMENT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">mk \u2022 3 years ago \u2013 (\nCOMMENT APPROVED AND PUBLISHED BY Devdutt Pattanaik in Midday newspaper )</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>let me share an\ninteresting and amusing anecdote as why nandi sits in front of Shiva\u015b lingam\nand why we all touch his scrotum... .In the jungles of Ratnagiri, a folktale\ntalks of lore long forgotten, there is tribe that sings the lore every\nshivrathri. &nbsp;it lore goes as below...<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Shiva after getting\nmarried to Parvati was enjoying his blissful wedded life. &nbsp;Parvathi after some time felt longing to visit\nher parents place and decided to go. after many years still she did not return.\n&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><i>Shiva it seems was very lonely and could\nnot continue to control his urge of sex. &nbsp;Lo as his phallus became stiffer, he decided\nto use Nandis help. &nbsp;</i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><i>Nandi allowed shiva\nto ravage his body on a condition that he would do once shiva has finished his\nurge. &nbsp;</i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Once Shiva was over with his\nappetite, he ran away from nandi and sat in a small room turned himself into a\nphallus thus avoiding nandi. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\">&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>nandi could\nnot the small room sat outside waiting for shiva and thus has been seating ever\nsince.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Since then, all\ndevotees of shiva touch nandi\u015b scrotum before we worship shiva as a reminder to\nnandi of shiva\u015b promise.. so goes the tale.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">I have heared this\nstory myself among the tribals of western ghats when trekking near these remote\nplaces. &nbsp;So whether you guys rebuke me or\nnot the story made every sense for me as to why touch Nandi\u015b balls everytime.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Kvie0QG0sxQ/Ut4MuAb30sI/AAAAAAAApII/-zn9djSaY6E/s1600/imaCTRges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Kvie0QG0sxQ/Ut4MuAb30sI/AAAAAAAApII/-zn9djSaY6E/s1600/imaCTRges.jpg\" width=\"311\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nandi, the white sacred\nbull with a black tail is the vahana ( Vimana ) of Lord Shiva. &nbsp;&nbsp;Almost\nall Shiva temples have the Nandi humped bull reclining on a raised platform and\nfacing the entrance door of the shrine gazing at the Lord in his symbolic Shiva\nLingam form.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Samudra Manthan\nthe whole sea polymerized due to a deadly poison catalyzed by Cobra Vasuki\u2019s\nvenom.&nbsp; The planet was now in imminent\ndanger .&nbsp; Lord Shiva came forward as only\nhe could salvage the grave situation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5vzJef2vsgA/Ut5SPWVKKLI/AAAAAAAApLs/10fbu7tJX8k/s1600/nandi.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"267\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5vzJef2vsgA/Ut5SPWVKKLI/AAAAAAAApLs/10fbu7tJX8k/s1600/nandi.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva scooped up the\npoison into his hand and drank it.&nbsp;\nFearing that her husband would die, Parvati constricted his neck and the\ndescent of the poison was in turn stopped at his throat.&nbsp; The poison started spilling out of his mouth\nand Nandi jumped forward and lapped it up.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The devas and asuras\nwatching were shocked and wondered aloud what would happen to Nandi.&nbsp; Lord Siva calmed their fears saying,\n\"Nandi&nbsp; has surrendered into me so\ncompletely that he has all my powers and my protection\".&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-d9uxPtgDW58/Ut4fK_idQBI/AAAAAAAApIk/n1gSXur4W9E/s1600/Lord-Shiva-ngdDrinking-Poison.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-d9uxPtgDW58/Ut4fK_idQBI/AAAAAAAApIk/n1gSXur4W9E/s1600/Lord-Shiva-ngdDrinking-Poison.jpg\" width=\"499\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nandi is of Shiva\u2019s gatekeeper. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mahakala is NOT a\ngatekeeper , along with Nandi as said by many.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Mahakala is Shiva himself as Lord\nof Space / Time . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Mahakala Shiva\nTemple in Ujjain is counted third among the twelve Jyotirlingas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Japanese worship Mahakala\n( Daikokuten-great black Deva &nbsp;).</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-quMCMXqP1hc/Ut5SDUgyPyI/AAAAAAAApLk/V93yujHfqAk/s1600/6.Nandi+bull.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"301\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-quMCMXqP1hc/Ut5SDUgyPyI/AAAAAAAApLk/V93yujHfqAk/s1600/6.Nandi+bull.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hindu mythology, Nandi\n&nbsp;is the guru of eighteen masters (18\nsiddhas) which also includes Maharishi Patanjali who wrote the Yoga Sutras. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Digression:</span>&nbsp;</b></span> People do NOT know that Yoga asanas primarily\nhelp to shift lymph fluids around your body in ways that you would not\nordinarily be able to achieve in daily life . &nbsp;Lymph nodes are the filters along the\nlymphatic system.&nbsp; Their job is to filter\nout and trap bacteria, viruses, cancer cells, and other unwanted substances,\nand to make sure they are safely eliminated from the body.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-x8yuMhBXbT8/Ut5S13X9syI/AAAAAAAApMM/JdzIpFehzwk/s1600/iBDBmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"264\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-x8yuMhBXbT8/Ut5S13X9syI/AAAAAAAApMM/JdzIpFehzwk/s1600/iBDBmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Approximately 70% are superficial lymphatic\ncapillaries located&nbsp; just under, the\nskin.&nbsp; The remaining 30%, which are known\nas deep lymphatic capillaries, surround most of the body\u2019s organs. &nbsp;The deep ones can be stimulated only by Yoga.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga\ndiaphragmatic breathing and many yoga positions open up the chest cavity, while\nposes like shoulder stands, enlist gravity to help lymph fluid get where it is\nsupposed to go.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/be9IipJt51M/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/be9IipJt51M&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/be9IipJt51M&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since there is no pump,\nthe lymph movement relies on contraction of smooth muscle tissue lining the walls\nof lymph vessels.&nbsp; Movement of skeletal\nmuscles is also important for driving lymph along the systems network of\nvessels to lymph nodes and from these to lymph ducts where the lymph tissue\njoins cardiovascular circulation. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nlymphatic system is a closed pressure system and has one-way valves that keep\nlymph moving towards the heart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--hMBmsoJWjg/Ut4kaRbPHOI/AAAAAAAApI0/XB9ceJ0SXJ4/s1600/imagesNGYUU.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--hMBmsoJWjg/Ut4kaRbPHOI/AAAAAAAApI0/XB9ceJ0SXJ4/s1600/imagesNGYUU.jpg\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Triple Sri Ravishankar\u2019s\nSOO HUM hyperventilation does NOT do this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogas keeps the human\nbody and mind healthy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you want to know\nmore about the 18 Siddhars whose Guru was Nandi , punch into Google search-</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>ALCHEMIST SIDDHAS , THE\nMERCURY EATERS VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Shiva Purana states\nthat Nandi &nbsp;is the intermediary between\nhumans and Lord Shiva.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before worshipping Lord\nShiva , devotees first seek the blessings of first devotee Nandi . &nbsp;&nbsp;Nandi is so devoted to Shiva that his every\nthought is directed to Him.&nbsp; Nandi is\nalways represented as quiet and benign. &nbsp;Nandi\nis also considered to be the guardian of four-legged animals. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-o7XCstLU9Qo/Ut5FFDIQFoI/AAAAAAAApK8/t8N8R-4s8Gs/s1600/Bull+1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-o7XCstLU9Qo/Ut5FFDIQFoI/AAAAAAAApK8/t8N8R-4s8Gs/s1600/Bull+1.jpg\" width=\"442\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Shiva temples, there\nis always a reclining bull placed in front of the chief shrine or just outside\nit, with the head turned away from the deity/ lingam &nbsp;but the gaze fixed on it. &nbsp;Its free animal nature is pulling it away from\nGod, but His grace pulling it back to him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hindu mythology,\nNandi is the bearer of faith, controlled strength / virility and protector of Dharma ( truth / righteousness.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spiritually, Nandi\nrepresents an individual jiva (soul) and the message that the jiva should\nalways be focussed on the Atman (Paramatman).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jZtq3tkaQjk/Ut5R6QbHw7I/AAAAAAAApLc/Clfn08Yfn5w/s1600/terracotta-table-decoration-item-harappa-image-SP86_l.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"271\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jZtq3tkaQjk/Ut5R6QbHw7I/AAAAAAAApLc/Clfn08Yfn5w/s1600/terracotta-table-decoration-item-harappa-image-SP86_l.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stone carvings and\nseals of Nandi bull were unearthed at Indus valley and Harappa.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-embMBu8av-U/Ut4uMlCMg1I/AAAAAAAApJY/UhUHRBfEkNc/s1600/Bull+3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-embMBu8av-U/Ut4uMlCMg1I/AAAAAAAApJY/UhUHRBfEkNc/s1600/Bull+3.jpg\" width=\"518\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Largest Nandis bull\nstatues in India are at the following Shiva temples :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lepakshi,\nAndhra Pradesh<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahadishwara\nTemple, Tamil Nadu<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chamundi\nHills, Mysore, Karnataka<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bull\nTemple, Bangalore, Karnataka<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rameswaram,\nTamil Nadu<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hoysaleswara\nTemple, Halebidu, Karnataka<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shanthaleswara\nTemple, Halebidu, Karnataka<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vadakkunnathan\nTemple, Thrissur, Kerala<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Virupaksha\nTemple, Hampi, Karnataka<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nandi\nTemple, Western Group of Temples, Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kedareshvara\nTemple at Balligavi (Karnataka)<o:p></o:p></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qFU_FRyTqEU/Ut5S--th9dI/AAAAAAAApMU/WXtHjTWolPU/s1600/imagMYKYU+es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"209\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qFU_FRyTqEU/Ut5S--th9dI/AAAAAAAApMU/WXtHjTWolPU/s1600/imagMYKYU+es.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Egypt the Apis bull (\nNandi ) is the incarnation of the god Ptah ( Shiva ) , the creator of the\nuniverse and master of destiny. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2psNrbSdQsI/Ut4qVN9VzoI/AAAAAAAApJE/VZzfXzjBZ4I/s1600/egypt_memphis_emperor_hindu_vaishnav.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2psNrbSdQsI/Ut4qVN9VzoI/AAAAAAAApJE/VZzfXzjBZ4I/s1600/egypt_memphis_emperor_hindu_vaishnav.jpg\" width=\"434\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later\nthe white historian made Apis ( Nandi bull ) the incarnation of Osiris, god of embalming and\ncemeteries, while Ptah was relegated to funerary characteristics and became\nassociated with Osiris. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D07Kcufl9U0/Ut4uTHvlfgI/AAAAAAAApJg/wd-QbHxhUzE/s1600/Apis_Bull_Nandi_Ancient_Egypt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"460\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D07Kcufl9U0/Ut4uTHvlfgI/AAAAAAAApJg/wd-QbHxhUzE/s1600/Apis_Bull_Nandi_Ancient_Egypt.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The river \u2018Nile\u2018 bears the Sanskrit name (Neel)\nindicating her blue waters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Shiva\u2019s son Lord\nKartik who was a great warrior learnt how to to fight from Nandi.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below; Golden bull ( Mesopotamia ) of UR 2000 BC.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bsUTFryBLfo/Ut4-kay1VVI/AAAAAAAApKM/zTRao_nltxA/s1600/2000BC_Ur_govwlden-bull's-head.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bsUTFryBLfo/Ut4-kay1VVI/AAAAAAAApKM/zTRao_nltxA/s1600/2000BC_Ur_govwlden-bull's-head.jpg\" width=\"221\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Egypt Ptah ( Shiva )\nis the spouse of Sekhmet ( Shakti ) and the father of Nefertum ( Lotus-navel of\nVishnu &nbsp;) . &nbsp;He was also regarded as the father of the Sage\nImhotep.( Lord Ayyappa ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-50ue-7fh6QI/Ut4tYG9zJBI/AAAAAAAApJQ/FC1jOqnF4qo/s1600/egypt_pyramids_architect_hindu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-50ue-7fh6QI/Ut4tYG9zJBI/AAAAAAAApJQ/FC1jOqnF4qo/s1600/egypt_pyramids_architect_hindu.jpg\" width=\"434\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Above : IMHOTEP -- the ninth avatar of Vishnu ( Lord Ayyappa )&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google search-</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>IMHOTEP, THE PATRON SAINT OF THE FREEMASONS &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astarte, the Syrian\ngoddess, and Venus, Isis, Ishter, Mylitta, Vach, etc., are identical with Aditi\nof the Hinduism.&nbsp; They are all the\n\"Mothers of all living\" and \"of the gods.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below : Nandi of Gobekli Tepe Turkey</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-t9lRQs1aRVY/Ut4-yxAA2FI/AAAAAAAApKU/TvDqJYRaK5A/s1600/apis+bull+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"177\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-t9lRQs1aRVY/Ut4-yxAA2FI/AAAAAAAApKU/TvDqJYRaK5A/s1600/apis+bull+(1).jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To know more about Gobekli\nTepi which was ruled by Emperor Vikramaditya in 7000 BC,--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">MYSTERY OF STONEHENGE\nSOLVED &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of course they consider\nthe original Hindus gods whom they have mirrored and absorbed into their own culture\nas Pagan.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wdWBKgAV_b4/Ut4x_QRZFCI/AAAAAAAApJ8/i9dr-uc7Awo/s1600/immjjgvfages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"261\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wdWBKgAV_b4/Ut4x_QRZFCI/AAAAAAAApJ8/i9dr-uc7Awo/s1600/immjjgvfages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The worship of the Apis\nbull ( Nandi ) was continued by the Greeks and after them by the Romans, and\nlasted until almost 500 A.D.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/blogger.g?blogID=3564735312144269387\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 16.363636016845703px; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Above: &nbsp;Alexander the great performed a sacrifice to Apis ( Nandi ) before he set out for war with the Persians.</span></i><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m4GjEHSIAog/Ut4xix9z_eI/AAAAAAAApJ0/-mHiR1W-JPc/s1600/imarhrtdfes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"263\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m4GjEHSIAog/Ut4xix9z_eI/AAAAAAAApJ0/-mHiR1W-JPc/s1600/imarhrtdfes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neolithic bull-horned\nstone altars have been found in Cyprus. &nbsp;The Canaanite (and later Carthaginian)\ndeity Moloch IS Nandi the bull. &nbsp; &nbsp;In\nGreek mythology, Taurus the bull was identified with Zeus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Nehemiah 9:18</b>\n<i>\"even when they made an idol shaped like a calf and said, 'This is your\ngod who brought you out of Egypt!</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-x0DH7VSKWoo/Ut5CcvrQUuI/AAAAAAAApKg/gUWcQmRlqGE/s1600/dv0039-veau-or.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"520\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-x0DH7VSKWoo/Ut5CcvrQUuI/AAAAAAAApKg/gUWcQmRlqGE/s1600/dv0039-veau-or.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above is the Biblical\nepisode wherein an idol of the Golden Bull is made by Aaron and worshipped by\nthe Hebrews in the wilderness of Sinai (Exodus)\u2014which got Moses so much pissed\noff that he broke his stone tablets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Golden Calf (Exodus\n32:1-32:45)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Israelites\nhad crossed the Red Sea they journeyed to Mount Sinai, it was here that God\ngave Moses the 10 Commandments and the plans for his dwelling place, the\ntabernacle. While Moses was at the top of Mount Sinai, the people of Israel\nwere at the bottom of the mountain and they made a golden calf to worship.\nMoses had been gone for several days and we can only imagine how Moses felt\nwhen he came down the mountain after just having received the laws of God, and\nthe fact that God had forbidden graven images.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Exodus 32:19-24 - And\nit came to pass, as soon as he came nigh unto the camp, that he saw the calf,\nand the dancing: and Moses' anger waxed hot, and he cast the tables out of his\nhands, and brake them beneath the mount. And he took the calf which they had made,\nand burnt [it] in the fire, and ground [it] to powder, and strawed [it] upon\nthe water, and made the children of Israel drink [of it].&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wZjn7cEVF1w/Ut5CtqHhvfI/AAAAAAAApKw/BmEqdc0RmQU/s1600/Golden-Calf-610x350.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"366\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wZjn7cEVF1w/Ut5CtqHhvfI/AAAAAAAApKw/BmEqdc0RmQU/s1600/Golden-Calf-610x350.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And Moses said unto\nAaron, What did this people unto thee, that thou hast brought so great a sin\nupon them? And Aaron said, Let not the anger of my lord wax hot: thou knowest\nthe people, that they [are set] on mischief.&nbsp;\nFor they said unto me, Make us gods, which shall go before us: for [as\nfor] this Moses, the man that brought us up out of the land of Egypt, we wot not\nwhat is become of him. And I said unto them, Whosoever hath any gold, let them\nbreak [it] off. So they gave [it] me: then I cast it into the fire, and there\ncame out this calf.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tCs_t3u34Dc/Ut5TSMAvC-I/AAAAAAAApMk/SVtDKuavTdw/s1600/kedarnath108.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tCs_t3u34Dc/Ut5TSMAvC-I/AAAAAAAApMk/SVtDKuavTdw/s1600/kedarnath108.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Moses went up into\nBiblical Mount Sinai to receive the Ten Commandments (Exodus 24:12-18), he left\nthe Israelites for forty days and forty nights. The Israelites have calculated\nthe 40 days by mornings and not by evenings and thus came to a wrong return\ndate of Moses. When they saw that Moses did not return in time they demanded\nthat Aaron make them \"Gods\" to go before them (Exodus 32:1).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aaron\ngathered up the Israelites' golden earrings, constructed a \"molten\ncalf\" and \"they\" that demanded \"gods\" declared:\n\"These [be] thy gods, O Israel, which brought thee up out of the land of\nEgypt.\" (Exodus 32:4) The plurality of gods depicted or honoured on the\near-rings became a united image of a calf, fashioned by Aaron with a\n\"graving tool\", a plurality in unity.[2]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aaron built an altar\nbefore the calf and proclaimed the next day to be a feast to the LORD.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So they\nrose up early the next day and \"offered burnt-offerings, and brought\npeace-offerings; and the people sat down to eat and to drink, and rose up to\nplay.\" (Exodus 32:6) God told Moses what the Israelites were up to back in\ncamp, that they had turned aside quickly out of the way which God commanded\nthem and he was going to destroy them and start a new people from Moses. Moses\nargued and pleaded that they should be spared (Exodus 32:11-14), and God\n\"repented of the evil which He said He would do unto His people.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-STeSZhp0kYU/Ut5TKMW7d9I/AAAAAAAApMc/ghvySEADZM0/s1600/imaDWQges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-STeSZhp0kYU/Ut5TKMW7d9I/AAAAAAAApMc/ghvySEADZM0/s1600/imaDWQges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moses went down from\nthe mountain, but upon seeing the calf, he became angry and threw down the two\nTablets of Stone, breaking them. Moses burnt the golden calf in a fire, ground\nit to powder, scattered it on water, and forced the Israelites to drink it.\nAaron admitted collecting the gold, and throwing it into the fire along with\ncutting wood, and said it came out as a calf.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then Moses stood in the\ngate of the camp, and said: 'Whoso is on the LORD's side, let him come unto me.'\nAnd all the sons of Levi gathered themselves together unto him. And he said\nunto them: 'Thus saith the LORD, the God of Israel: Put ye every man his sword\nupon his thigh, and go to and fro from gate to gate throughout the camp, and\nslay every man his brother, and every man his companion, and every man his\nneighbour.'&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0NDTIZfaZi4/Ut5Ckn5z9TI/AAAAAAAApKo/JbNMeyp_bn8/s1600/imYTRages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"245\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0NDTIZfaZi4/Ut5Ckn5z9TI/AAAAAAAApKo/JbNMeyp_bn8/s1600/imYTRages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And the sons of Levi did according to the word of Moses; and there\nfell of the people that day about three thousand men. (Exodus 32:26-28). &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OH BOY !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Harshil Shah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">September 21, 2014 at\n9:06 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pranam Guruji,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indeed, i read the\nabove post and its exactly same.
