, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BnmHxo2Trew/Urm-oCf0-zI/AAAAAAAAojQ/E912t5EFX94/s1600/BefHTDore-300x253.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"337\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BnmHxo2Trew/Urm-oCf0-zI/AAAAAAAAojQ/E912t5EFX94/s400/BefHTDore-300x253.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The frenzy in the arena attracted a male \"skeptic\" from the audience to volunteer.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was\nvisibly unimpressed by the arm pull down test and the claim of instantaneous\nimprovement of strength and vigor following the application of a few drops of\noil. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The skeptic boldly asked for permission to perform the same test on his\nown test subject on the dais. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the skeptic\nreadied his subjects, Triple Sri changed his track and launched into a astounding theory for his precious oil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He spAke &nbsp;<i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201cone drop of poison can destroy the body. Can\nit not destroy? One drop of poison can destroy the immune system. No? HOOO ? No\n? The reverse can also happen \u2013 one drop of nectar can also strengthen your\nbody.\u201d</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The stupefied audience\ngaped in awe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What happened\nafterwards was most hilarious . &nbsp;The \u201ctest\nsubjects\u201d chosen by the \u201cskeptic\u201d gave testimonies to the audience that they\nfelt \u201csomething different,\u201d and the skeptic had to agree, on the microphone,\nthat he was convinced of the power of the messiah and his great oil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gullible IIT Kanpur\naudience could NOT stop clapping. These are the same folks AAP\u2019s Kumar Vishwas\nrecites mindless non-veg Hindi poetry ( CHOO LAA &nbsp;is this poetry, is he a poet &nbsp;? ) and gets these rustic North Indians in\nraptures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some Shakthi Drops, are\nsold for 25 Euros in 30ml vials on Art of Living\u2019s EU website. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Triple Sri uses the\nreaction principle to trick all.&nbsp; Push ,\nrelax a muscle and then pull.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Triple Sri\u2019s oil which\ngives rocket boost in immunity and muscle strength is not even pseudo science \u2013 it\nis sheer fraud.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<i style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Below video: Check out the cerebral quality and CLASS of our IIT students -- even Sidhu will NOT laugh for this rustic nonsense . &nbsp;Is this poetry ? .</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/Ia25LmR28wo/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/Ia25LmR28wo&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/Ia25LmR28wo&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2005, Prince\nManvendra Singh Gohil, who hails from Rajpipla in the Gujarat, publicly came\nout as gay. He was quickly anointed by the Indian and the world media as the\nfirst openly gay royal.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Big brother made sure he got on to The\nOprah Winfrey Show on October 24, 2007.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was Amartya Sen (\nwith a Rothschild wife ) who first took up cudgels against Section 377 of IPC\ncode, demanding free sex for gays in Sept 2006..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a copy of an\nopen letter instigated by him , and supported by many moth eaten faces (supporting\nNOW )&nbsp; you see of prime time of foreign\nfunded Indian media.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Open Letters against\nSection 377</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">by <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amartya Sen, et al.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To the Government of\nIndia, Members of the Judiciary, and All Citizens,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">To build a truly\ndemocratic and plural India, we must collectively fight against laws and\npolicies that abuse human rights and limit fundamental freedoms.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">This is why we,\nconcerned Indian citizens and people of Indian origin, support the overturning\nof Section 377 of the Indian Penal Code, a colonial-era law dating to 1861,\nwhich punitively criminalizes romantic love and private, consensual sexual acts\nbetween adults of the same sex.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">In independent India,\nas earlier, this archaic and brutal law has served no good purpose.&nbsp; It has been used to systematically persecute,\nblackmail, arrest and terrorize sexual minorities.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">It has spawned public intolerance and abuse,\nforcing tens of millions of gay and bisexual men and women to live in fear and\nsecrecy, at tragic cost to themselves and their families.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">It is especially disgraceful that Section 377\nhas on several recent occasions been used by homophobic officials to suppress\nthe work of legitimate HIV-prevention groups, leaving gay and bisexual men in\nIndia even more defenceless against HIV infection.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Such human rights\nabuses would be cause for shame anywhere in the modern world, but they are\nespecially so in India, which was founded on a vision of fundamental rights\napplying equally to all, without discrimination on any grounds.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-29ZRXTyLBfE/Urn9JhvNpiI/AAAAAAAAokc/4Jhsrdebc1I/s1600/imautcdges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-29ZRXTyLBfE/Urn9JhvNpiI/AAAAAAAAokc/4Jhsrdebc1I/s1600/imautcdges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">By presumptively treating as criminals those\nwho </span><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">love</span> </b><span style=\"color: blue;\">people of the same sex, Section 377 violates fundamental human rights,\nparticularly the rights to equality and privacy that are enshrined in our\nConstitution as well as in the binding international laws that we have embraced,\nincluding the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Let us always remember\nthe indisputable truth expressed in the opening articles of the Universal\nDeclaration of Human Rights that \"All persons are born free and equal in\ndignity and rights. . . Everyone is entitled to all the rights and freedoms set\nforth in this declaration, without distinction of any kind.\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>We will move many steps\ncloser to our goal of achieving a just, pluralistic and democratic society by\nthe ending of Section 377, which is currently under challenge before the Delhi\nHigh Court.&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>There should be no discrimination\nin India on the grounds of sexual orientation.&nbsp;\nIn the name of humanity and our Constitution, this cruel and\ndiscriminatory law should be struck down.</i><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sincerely,</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only some names are here -</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vikram Seth</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">, &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swami Agnivesh</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 30 June 2008, Indian\nlabour minister Oscar Fernandes backed calls for decriminalisation of\nconsensual gay sex, and the Prime Minister immediately Manmohan Singh called\nfor greater tolerance towards homosexuals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Foreign funded Trojan\nHorse NGOs covertly ( with the support of the waitress ) organized Gay Pride\nParades all over India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 29 June 2008, five\nIndian cities (Delhi, Bangalore, Kolkata, Indore and Pondicherry) celebrated\ngay pride parades.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">About 2,000 people turned out in these nationwide parades.\nMumbai held its pride march on 16 August 2008, with Bollywood starlet Celina\nJaitley whipping up frenzy as a Congress worker.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Celina Jaitley ,an unknown starlet , joined the Congress in March\n2004 , and we all wondered what is the big deal--what the main stream media blitzkieg is all about .. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In April 2007 she said that\nCongress MP Rahul Gandhi was a born leader and his leadership would change the\nworld for the better. TEE HEEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Days after the 2 July\n2009 Delhi High Court verdict legalizing homosexuality, Pink Pages, India's\nfirst online LGBT magazine was released.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">On 16 April 2009, India's first gay\nmagazine Bombay Dost, was re-launched by Celina Jaitley in Mumbai. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Celina Jaitley was\njumping up and down like an orangutan ,vociferously being a&nbsp; proponent of abolition of Article 377 of\nIndian Penal Code (IPC), which criminalized homosexuality.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The actress once\nstated that her first boyfriend was a closet homosexual who died of the usual\nhomosexual problems becoming a bag of bones .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The same day, Union Law Minister Veerappa Moily announced that the Union Home Minister\nhas convened a meeting with the Union Law Ministers, Union Health Ministers and\nHome Ministers of all states to evolve a consensus on decriminalising\nhomosexuality in India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 28 June 2009, Delhi and Bangalore held their second\ngay pride parades, and Chennai \u2013 generally considered to be a very conservative\ncity \u2013 held its first. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything was stage\nmanaged as if all Indians were dying to give freedom for the LGBT community to\nstart preying openly .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Delhi High Court on\nJuly 2, 2009 decriminalised gay sex as provided in Section 377 of the Indian\nPenal Code (IPC) and had ruled that sex between two consenting adults in\nprivate would not be an offence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Attendance at the pride\nparades has been increasing significantly since 2008, with an estimated\nparticipation of 13,500 people in Delhi and 1,500 people in Bangalore in 2010,\nand a similar attendance of over 3,000 in Mumbai in 2011.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the first queer\nfilm festival that is held in a mainstream multiplex theater and screens LGBT\nfilms from all over the world. It has been recognized by Interpride as a pride\nevent in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Love looks not with the\neyes, but with the mind.&nbsp; &nbsp;It's love when a woman rejoices for her\npartner's happiness and his dreams , &nbsp;even if that means being away from her . &nbsp;Love involves personal sacrifice, and it grows\nslowly. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; We will NOT put our children in boarding\nschools or allow them to say with the grandparents. font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Love is not about\n\"me\" \u2013 what I can have? \u2013 </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oxytocin injected into\nthe cerebrospinal fluid causes an instantaneous hard on in rats TEE HEEEE!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A woman's sex drive\npeaks in her late 20s and early 30s. &nbsp;As a result of decreased testosterone as\nmen age, they tend to become more compassionate as their levels go down.\nConversely, as a woman's estrogen level decreases with age, she will become more\nassertive. Now you know why 3 of our women CM s are the way they are.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EU_ZuBOV-b8/UsBOgJv_z3I/AAAAAAAAo2A/-uxwj60KARU/s1600/serotonin-dopamine.american-apparel-unisex-athletic-tee.athletic-black.w760h760.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two major hormones\ninvolved in a feeling of gay attachment; oxytocin and vasopressin. &nbsp;An enlarged subpopulation of vasopressin\ncontaining neurons can be found in the suprachiasmatic nucleus (SCN) of\nhomosexual men as compared to heterosexuals.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasopressin is a hormone in the commitment\nstage and is released after lustful sex. &nbsp;Vasopressin is calle \"the monogamy\nchemical\", and suppression of vasopressin can cause males to abandon their\nlove nest and seek prey..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-B610mm-YW1g/UsBOXQgvG0I/AAAAAAAAo14/2YdMZXvRvCA/s1600/imjyfcdvages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"238\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-B610mm-YW1g/UsBOXQgvG0I/AAAAAAAAo14/2YdMZXvRvCA/s320/imjyfcdvages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine is tied into\nsexual desire while norepinephrine is related to subjective excitement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That initial butterflies\n&nbsp;that comes when we're first falling in\nlove includes a racing heart, flushed skin and sweaty palms. &nbsp;This is due to the dopamine, norepinephrine\nand phenylethylamine we're releasing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dopamine is the the \"pleasure chemical,\"\nproducing a feeling of bliss. &nbsp;Dopamine\nis a neurotransmitter that affects pleasure and motivation. It causes a\nsensation akin to a substance-induced high. Dopamine is &nbsp;activated by cocaine .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uzQ6mm4Mib8/UsBOPaOa15I/AAAAAAAAo1w/ouKQGk25F1U/s1600/imagkuvges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"289\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uzQ6mm4Mib8/UsBOPaOa15I/AAAAAAAAo1w/ouKQGk25F1U/s320/imagkuvges.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Norepinephrine is\nsimilar to adrenaline and produces the racing heart and excitement. &nbsp;Together these two chemicals produce elation,\nintense energy, sleeplessness, craving, loss of appetite and focused attention.\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People in love have lower levels of\nserotonin and the neural circuits associated with the way we usually assess\nothers are suppressed. &nbsp;These lower\nserotonin levels are the same as those found in people with\nobsessive-compulsive disorders, &nbsp;explaining why those in love\n\"obsess\" about their partner.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin is a hormone that make people\ntemporarily insane.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hormones that are\npresent in the brain when people experience infatuation include testosterone,\nestrogen, dopamine, norepinephrine, serotonin, oxytocin, and vasopressin. Dopamine,\nnorepinephrine, and serotonin are more commonly found during the attraction\nphase of a relationship.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DoQM3tzwrcg/UsBOH-3E7TI/AAAAAAAAo1o/LXzG_kZ9YbY/s1600/happiness.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DoQM3tzwrcg/UsBOH-3E7TI/AAAAAAAAo1o/LXzG_kZ9YbY/s640/happiness.jpg\" width=\"478\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oxytocin and vasopressin are linked to longer term\nbonding and relationships characterized by strong attachments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lust is brought on by\nsurges of sex hormones, such as testosterone and estrogen. These induce an\nindiscriminate scramble for base physical gratification. &nbsp;&nbsp;Testosterone levels shoot up in a man even\nduring a casual chat with an attractive female stranger. The stronger the\nhormonal reaction, the more marked the changes in behavior.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Events occurring in\nthe brain when we are in love have similarities with mental illness. &nbsp;Women who sniffed androstadienone, a signaling\nchemical found in male sweat, saliva, and semen, experience higher levels of\nthe hormone cortisol.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6UO_4FIfXYQ/UsBOCrWEpXI/AAAAAAAAo1g/qvV12C-JUME/s1600/ikjugvmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"389\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6UO_4FIfXYQ/UsBOCrWEpXI/AAAAAAAAo1g/qvV12C-JUME/s400/ikjugvmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This results in sexual arousal and improved mood. The\neffect lasts more than one hour. Falling in love involves the enhanced\nsecretion of b-Phenylethylamine (PEA, or the \"love chemical\") in the\nfirst 2 years of the relationship. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sexual\nforeplay and intercourse stimulate the same parts of a woman\u2019s body that are\ninvolved in giving birth and nursing. Flushed cheeks, a racing heart beat and\nclammy hands are some of the outward signs of being in love. But inside the\nbody there are definite hormone and chemical signs that cupid has fired his\narrow.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lust is driven by the sex hormones testosterone and oestrogen. Testosterone\nis not confined only to men. It also plays a major role in the sex drive of\nwomen. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Endorphins are also\ninvolved in the longevity of love. Endorphins have the same pain-killing and\npleasure-delivering properties as their cousin, morphine, without the risk of\noverdose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PEA or phenylethylamine\nand it is PEA which controls the transition from lust to love. Similar in\nstructure to amphetamine, PEA too gives us that excitement we crave. Indeed,\nsome people become veritable love junkies. They need a constant love high and\ngo through life in a series of short multiple relationships which crumble when\nthe initial chemical rush wanes. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-S3fbJG2-7bs/UsBN7tTkMyI/AAAAAAAAo1Y/Ci8AOPNMnW8/s1600/ecstacy+12.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"216\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-S3fbJG2-7bs/UsBN7tTkMyI/AAAAAAAAo1Y/Ci8AOPNMnW8/s640/ecstacy+12.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The love junky has\nanother problem too. After some times he builds a tolerance to these chemicals\neventually, so it takes more and more to produce that much sought after high. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Love junkies, if they stay married, are likely\nto seek frequent affairs to fuel their need for the chemical love high\u2014these are\nthe ones who try to <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">MENTALLY COPULATE</b> with every single attractive female they\nwalk past.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; My husband ran\naway too....but the young man got his license number and a few hours later we\nwere in the police station. My husband vehemently denied that the accusations\nwere true and that he'd never seen the young man before.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">My husband grew up in a\nsmall little Midwest town. SHIVA IS NOT A LGBT TRANSGENDER. . These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti ( Prakriti) ..<br /><br />The concept of Ardhanarishvara clearly brings out the fact that Prakriti (Shakti) and Purusha (Shiva) are nothing without each other and one cannot exist and function in the absence of the other...<br /><br />Purusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept\u2026<br /><br /><br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_132MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">MIND YOU --SHIVA AND HIS CONSORT SHAKTI ( PARVATI/ DEVI/ KALI/ DURGA ) ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES...</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Purusha is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Prakriti is the embodiment of pure energy. Through uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side anal sex as figured out by small minds)\u2026</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves..</span><br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Prakriti symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy. ..</span></div>\n<br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">The eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. ..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change.Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation..</span><br /><br /><div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">In the highest planes they are interchangeable, which is why we see a great incongruence between our spiritual experiences and the external reality.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">The union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death\u2026</span><br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW SHIVA TO BE DENIGRATED BY&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">DEEP STATE JUDGES</span></b><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;AND LAWYERS IN THE PAYROLL OF FOREIGN FORCES ANYMORE\u2026</span></span><br /><div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: xx-large;\">FOREIGN FUNDED CULTURAL TERRORISM SHALL STOP .. IT STOPS NOW..</b></div>\n<br /><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_9.html</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">ENOUGH IS ENOUGH\u2026&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The experience of sleep\nparalysis sounds too crazy to be true. &nbsp;When\nit occurs, which it does with surprising frequency, the victim often questions\nhis or her own sanity, &nbsp;if he does NOT\nbelieve in the devil. &nbsp;One in 3 people\nsuffer from it- yet they keep quiet for fear of being ridiculed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some wake up in the\nmiddle of the night, paralysed for a few seconds, unable to move or speak. Their\n&nbsp;mind is awake but the body is still\nasleep. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They feel the presence\nor a fearsome entity, -- an evil entity lurking . &nbsp;For some, this entity sits on their chest and\ntried to strangulate them. For some this entity pulls away the sheets, and in\nthe struggle they fall down. &nbsp;Most people\nwho fall down from the beds have been victims of this. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleep paralysis may\nleave you feeling frightened, especially if you also see or hear things that\naren't really there. Sleep paralysis may happen only once, or you may have it\nfrequently -- even several times a night.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">I know of a very\nintelligent man who had a fight with his wife\u2019s brother over some property.\nThat night he experience the devil as he told me. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He accused his wife\u2019s\nbrother &nbsp;of \"CALLING THE DEVIL INTO HIS\nHOUSE BY BLACK MAGIC \" &nbsp;He did some puja\nand wanted to evacuate and go somewhere else.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When he narrated this\nto me his mouth was frothing and his hands trembling due to indignation and\nrage. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I had to calm him down and explain the\nmeaning of sleep paralysis which can be triggered by improper transitions to\nREM ( rapid eye movement sleep ) .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are the type of\nauthors who give fuel to rationalists like Dr Dhabolkar . Hinduism praised by\nQuantum physicists does NOT support this nonsense .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me introduce\nyou to some secrets-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you do rapid\ntyping do you really think your brain is involved\u2014 ask yourself\u2014 or do you\nthink that your body cells have their own intelligence? &nbsp;You brain is involved only till you master\ntyping. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like driving , when you\nbecome an expert you can day dream and drive fast through heavy traffic. &nbsp;You may miss a landmark, or drive past your supermarket\nwhere you wanted to shop, but you have NOT killed anybody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scientists think that\nyour brain holds all your memory. The muscles controlling the eyes and diaphragm remain active.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM sleep is when we\nhave our most vivid dreams. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleep paralysis happens\nwhen REM sleep bleeds into wakefulness. &nbsp;The\nrelease of certain neurotransmitters is shut down during REM.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;When\nthis occurs it is called REM atonia, a state in which the body's muscles won't\nmove.&nbsp; This is so when we dream, we don't\nphysically act it out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the way people who\nridicule Baba Ramdev must know that there are also links ( which can be\nmodified ) between homosexuality and the connectivity of the amygdala to the\nrest of the brain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Homosexuality depends on hormonal factors operating during\nfetal life and NOT genetics. No baby is born a homosexual. While the amygdala\nis almost fully developed at birth, the prefrontal cortex does not mature until\nearly adulthood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person with sleep\nparalysis who feels a sinister presence in his room during an episode, must\nknow that he is hallucinating. &nbsp;&nbsp;Sleep\nparalysis is not considered a dangerous health problem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rarely is sleep paralysis linked to deep\nunderlying psychiatric problems, with the need for charlatan demon exorcists or\nspecial pujas or counseling by psychiatrists who would love to milk you. &nbsp;There is NO need to run away from your \u201chaunted\u201d\nhouse. There is NO sinister menacing intruder watching you in your locked bedroom.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several features of REM breathing patterns exacerbate the feeling of\nsuffocation. Attempts at breathing deeply fail, and give you a sense of\nresistance, which the threat-activated amygdala vigilance system interprets as\nsomeone sitting on your chest, suffocating you.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breathing difficulty is due to paralysis of\nthe muscles in the upper airways that causes feelings of choking and\nsuffocation.&nbsp; Deprived of external cues\nthat would normally allow a sense of fear to be disconfirmed, attempts to\nanalyse the source of the fear will fail. This may lead to a sense of\napprehension that last a few minutes.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nneurotransmitters that control voluntary movement are blocked during REM\nsleep-- a process called atonia. &nbsp;Some\npeople feel vibrations or hear vague rustling sounds<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You cant move because two\nchemicals in the brain, GABA and glycine, which signal between brain cells, are\nresponsible for switching off the neurons that allow your muscles to be active.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">If you get frozen in\nthis paralysed state break it off by rapidly moving your eyes to and fro.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress and sleep apnea interrupts\nnormal sleep cycles, which can greatly contribute to the likelihood of sleep\nparalysis.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">Some people experience levitation\nor out-of-body experiences, which is a type of hallucination due to high\nactivity in the amygdala, the emotional centre of the brain during REM sleep. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This is associated with structures in the\nbrain known as vestibular nuclei that co-ordinate body movements.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; And they forget\nwhat they have studied 2 days ago. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why you see\nsome morbidly obese people in your office STUPID and they have NOT been getting\nREM sleep due to sleep APNEA, where their air passage get choked.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 9 hours of sleep\nthere will be 6 such REM cycles. Infants generally require about 16 hours\na day, while teenagers need about 9 hours on average. For most adults, 7 to 8\nhours a night appears to be the best amount of sleep, although some people may\nneed as few as 5 hours . &nbsp;When people do\nNOT get proper REM sleep ( like people with sleep apnea ) &nbsp;, hallucinations and mood swings may develop.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At least 95% of all\ndreams are not remembered. Certain brain chemicals necessary for converting\nshort-term memories into long-term ones are suppressed during REM sleep. Unless\na dream is particularly vivid and if one wakes during or immediately after it,\nthe content of the dream is not remembered, unless you write it down\nimmediately within a few seconds .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Horses , other\nherbivorous ungulates and Zebra can sleep while standing, but must necessarily\nlie down for REM sleep. Some aquatic mammals and some birds can sleep with one\nhalf of the brain while the other half is awake, so-called unihemispheric\nslow-wave sleep.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM sleep and the\nability to dream seem to be embedded in the biology of many organisms that live\non Earth. During REM sleep, your brain consolidates and\nprocesses the information you\u2019ve learned during the day. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It forms neural\nconnections that strengthen memory, and replenishes its supply of\nneurotransmitters, including feel-good chemicals like serotonin and dopamine\nthat boost your mood during the day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Learned skills\nconsolidate in the brain during the REM sleep. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/o4HbD_uNKPw/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/o4HbD_uNKPw&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/o4HbD_uNKPw&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">* THE ABOVE VERSE WAS THE END OF OUR SCHOOL PRAYER- HOW PROFOUND !</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om ! May He protect us\nboth together; may He nourish us both together;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May we work conjointly\nwith great energy,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May our study be\nvigorous and effective;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May we not mutually\ndispute (or may we not hate any).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om ! Let there be Peace\nin me !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let there be Peace in\nmy environment !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let there be Peace in\nthe forces that act on me !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Gananam tva Ganapati\ngum Havamahe <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">May we worship\nGanapati, the Protector of Noble People <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The best Poet, the Most\nHonourable, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Greatest Ruler and\nthe treasure of all knowledge <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; You alone I shall call the direct Brahman. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I shall call you righteousness.\nI shall call you truth.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May He protect me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May He protect the\nreciter (Reciter = the one who is currently reciting this mantra. Identifying\noneself here as \"reciter\", and&nbsp;\nnot as \"I\", is a sign of self-realization, of transcending\nbeyond self and ego being dissolved). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May He protect me. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May He protect the\nreciter. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om, peace, peace, peace\n!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; line-height: 150%;\">Om ! That is\ninfinite(Brahman), and this (universe) is infinite.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The infinite proceeds\nfrom the infinite.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(Then) taking the\ninfinitude of the infinite (universe),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It remains as the\ninfinite (Brahman) alone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om ! Peace ! Peace !\nPeace !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ct_o1u0H1fI/UrcxOgfJ6dI/AAAAAAAAogw/LmEy6yvzFVk/s1600/10122013846.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ct_o1u0H1fI/UrcxOgfJ6dI/AAAAAAAAogw/LmEy6yvzFVk/s400/10122013846.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"273\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt.
