line-height: 150%;\">Type 1 and type 2\ndiabetes mellitus are diseases that have in common, sugar in the urine and the\nincreased urination. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Type 1 diabetes </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">is not preventable, while in type 2 diabetes\nmuch of its onset is the result of foods and beverages you consume, body weight,\nfitness and lifestyle. .</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/gYLI7bzf_VE/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/gYLI7bzf_VE&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/gYLI7bzf_VE&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When there are high\namounts of sugar in the blood, the kidneys filter sugar into the urine.\nPatients who develop diabetes mellitus most commonly have initial symptoms of\nincreased thirst, increased urination and blurred vision due to high amounts of\nsugar in the fluids of the eye.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Type 2 diabetes, the\nbody cannot use the insulin it produces. . To use glucose, your body needs\ninsulin.&nbsp; Insulin is made by the pancreas\nby Beta cells in the Islets of Langerhans.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n&nbsp;After eating, the pancreas\nautomatically releases an adequate amount of insulin to transport the blood\nglucose into the cells, which results in lower blood sugar levels. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you have type 2 diabetes,\nthe glucose in the bloodstream does not enter the cells (at all or not enough),\n&nbsp;so glucose builds up until levels are\ntoo high, resulting in a condition called hyperglycemia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consequently, excessive\namounts of glucose accumulate in the blood. &nbsp;This blood glucose overload is eventually\npassed out of the body in urine. &nbsp;Even\nthough the blood has plenty of insulin, the cells of a person with diabetes are\nnot getting their crucial energy and growth requirements. This is starvation in\nthe midst of plenty.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blood glucose is\nessential for the proper functioning of brain cells. Therefore, low blood sugar\ncan lead to central nervous system symptoms such as:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">dizziness,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">confusion,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">weakness, and</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tremors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insulin job is to\nassist the body in turning food into energy.&nbsp;\nInsulin also helps the body to store excess energy that can be used at a\nlater time.&nbsp; When we eat, insulin causes glucose\nto move from the blood to the body's cells. There, the glucose is used to make\nprotein, fat and sugar. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/DpdlJ79ACCo/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/DpdlJ79ACCo&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/DpdlJ79ACCo&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Between meals, insulin\nhelps the body utilize the stored proteins, fats and sugars for energy. Insulin\nsignaling in the brain decreases appetite and prevents glucose production by\nthe liver through neuronal signals from the hypothalamus.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insulin is necessary\nfor the body to be able to use sugar. Sugar is the basic fuel for the cells in\nthe body, and insulin takes the sugar from the blood into the cells.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nglucose builds up in the blood instead of going into cells, it can cause two\nproblems:</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right away, your cells\nmay be starved for energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over time, high blood\nglucose levels may hurt your eyes, kidneys, nerves or heart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Approximately 80\npercent of people with type 2 diabetes are overweight. &nbsp;Unlike type 1 diabetes, type 2 diabetes, &nbsp;is NOT &nbsp;an autoimmune disease . Here there is &nbsp;insulin resistance, which is the inability of\nthe body to use the insulin that it produces. &nbsp;Eventually, in type 2 diabetes insulin\nproduction can decline too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sA_4dJT7wo0/Uqwys1USraI/AAAAAAAAoR0/_b9x-Ovv_so/s1600/2011-pancreas.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sA_4dJT7wo0/Uqwys1USraI/AAAAAAAAoR0/_b9x-Ovv_so/s640/2011-pancreas.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"588\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person with diabetes\nhas a condition in which the quantity of glucose in the blood is too elevated\n(hyperglycemia).&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This excess blood glucose eventually passes\nout of the body in urine. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, even\nthough the blood has plenty of glucose, the cells are not getting it for their\nessential energy and growth requirements.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Complications linked to\nbadly controlled diabetes:</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Eye complications</span> -\nglaucoma, cataracts, diabetic retinopathy, and some others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Foot complications</span> -\nneuropathy, ulcers, and sometimes gangrene which may require that the foot be\namputated<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Skin complications</span> -\npeople with diabetes are more susceptible to skin infections and skin disorders<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Heart problems</span> - such\nas ischemic heart disease, when the blood supply to the heart muscle is\ndiminished<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Hypertension</span> - common\nin people with diabetes, which can raise the risk of kidney disease, eye\nproblems, heart attack and stroke<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Mental health</span> -\nuncontrolled diabetes raises the risk of suffering from depression, anxiety and\nsome other mental disorders<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Hearing loss</span> - diabetes\npatients have a higher risk of developing hearing problems<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Gum disease</span> - there is\na much higher prevalence of gum disease among diabetes patients<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Gastroparesis </span>- the\nmuscles of the stomach stop working properly<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ketoacidosis -</span> a\ncombination of ketosis and acidosis; accumulation of ketone bodies and acidity\nin the blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Neuropathy</span> - diabetic\nneuropathy is a type of nerve damage which can lead to several different\nproblems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">HHNS (Hyperosmolar\nHyperglycemic Nonketotic Syndrome) </span>- blood glucose levels shoot up too high,\nand there are no ketones present in the blood or urine. &nbsp;It is an emergency condition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nephropathy</span> -\nuncontrolled blood pressure that can lead to kidney disease<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">PAD (peripheral\narterial disease)</span> - symptoms may include pain in the leg, tingling and\nsometimes problems walking properly<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Stroke</span> - if blood\npressure, cholesterol levels, and blood glucose levels are not controlled, the\nrisk of stroke increases significantly<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Erectile dysfunction</span> -\nmale impotence-- the reason why drunkard Pickle Johns get nagged by Chutney Marys<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8wdLI8Mx9oo/UqxeYQU9SKI/AAAAAAAAoSE/aKirJQUkL68/s1600/fr3g.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8wdLI8Mx9oo/UqxeYQU9SKI/AAAAAAAAoSE/aKirJQUkL68/s200/fr3g.jpg\" height=\"200\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Infections</span> - people\nwith badly controlled diabetes are much more susceptible to infections<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Healing of wounds</span> -\ncuts and lesions take much longer to heal.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Hdr5fXrbCnI/Uqys2YenFKI/AAAAAAAAoS4/chdfrZXDPGk/s1600/5.c.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Hdr5fXrbCnI/Uqys2YenFKI/AAAAAAAAoS4/chdfrZXDPGk/s320/5.c.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"296\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With type 2 diabetes,\nthe muscles and liver that normally take up blood sugar and use it for energy\nbegin to lose their sensitivity to the hormone insulin, a condition known as\ninsulin resistance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In type 2 diabetis\ninitially &nbsp;the pancreas keeps up with the\nadded demand by producing more insulin. In time, however, it loses the ability\nto secrete enough insulin in response to meals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a few type 2\npatients, years of insulin overproduction cause the beta cells of the pancreas to\nburn out and STOP making insulin. &nbsp;The\nresult of both long-term type 1 and type 2 diabetes mellitus is end-organ\ndamage. &nbsp;Patients can develop blindness,\nkidney failure and vascular disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The only way to be sure\nabout your blood sugar levels is to test them regularly. . People with a lot of\nvisceral fat, also known as central obesity, belly fat, or abdominal obesity,\nare especially at risk<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the food we\nconsume is broken down into glucose. Glucose is a type of sugar in the blood -\nit is the main source of food for our bodies (our cells). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When food is digested it eventually enters our\nbloodstream in the form of glucose. Cells utilize the glucose for growth and\nenergy. However, without the help of insulin, the glucose cannot enter our\ncells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People with type 2\ndiabetes might have to take oral medicines that work by improving the cells\u2019\nresponse to insulin and increase insulin production. If the body reduces the\namount of insulin it produces over time, people with type 2 diabetes may also\nhave to start taking insulin. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people may be able\nto control their type 2 diabetes symptoms by losing weight, following a healthy\ndiet, doing plenty of exercise, and monitoring their blood glucose levels.\nHowever, type 2 diabetes is typically a progressive disease - it gradually gets\nworse - and the patient will probably end up have to take insulin, usually in\ntablet form.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uvrCkvjN7aY/Uqysg9j8aII/AAAAAAAAoSo/7ygTBaLWXjA/s1600/type-2-diabetes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uvrCkvjN7aY/Uqysg9j8aII/AAAAAAAAoSo/7ygTBaLWXjA/s400/type-2-diabetes.jpg\" height=\"275\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per Ayurveda coconut\nwater is rich in a lot of nutrients that are required by diabetics to keep\ntheir blood sugar levels in control. &nbsp;Coconut water has the ability to satiate your\nhunger, and prevent you from eating in excess. Tender coconut water ( drunk\nwithin 2 minutes of opening ) is good for people who are on the road to\nDiabetes 2 - have one glass coconut water a day. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; It is fat free and cholesterol free, both important factors in a\ndiabetic diet. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Arginine, a nutrient\nfound in watermelons is very effective in enhancing the effect of insulin on\nsugar, thus reducing insulin resistance. &nbsp;It is also beneficial in cases of erectile\ndysfunction, another health issue that many diabetics have to cope with.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Arginine, is the\nchampion of amino acids when it comes to biochemical versatility-- no other\namino acid can match its broad spectrum of benefits. &nbsp;Arginine can help improve our insulin\nsensitivity, which is the same as diminishing our insulin resistance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kidney disorders are\nalso common among diabetics. The high potassium content in watermelon helps in\nwashing off toxic compounds in the kidneys. It is also helpful in reducing\nblood uric acid levels which can otherwise cause kidney damage. The high water\ncontent in watermelon also induces frequent urination which helps the kidneys\nflush out toxins from the body.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc is not stored by\nthe body, which means a consistent intake is required to maintain steady\nlevels. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc is present in\nvarious foods, but it can also be supplemented for those who may be at risk for\ndeficiencies. &nbsp;Zinc supplements are\ncommonly sold as zinc chelate. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc is essential for\nreading genetic instructions, and when diets do not contain foods rich in zinc,\ninstructions get misread, or not read at all. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the foods in our\ndiet do not provide us with enough zinc, insulin response decreases, and our\nblood sugar becomes more difficult to stabilize. &nbsp;Metabolic rate - the rate at which we create\nand use up energy - also depends on zinc for its regulation. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">If you are a diabetes\npatient, you are EVIL Big Pharma\u2019s best friend. &nbsp;You have been ear-marked for the rest of your\nlife as a cash cow for the companies who make diabetes medicines, syringes,\nblood sugar monitors, insulin, cotton swabs, and more. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Both the US Food and\nDrug Administration (FDA) and the European Food Safety Authority says Aspartame\nin artificial sweeteners is safe ( if people consume less than 50 mg of\naspartame per kilogram of body weight each day )\u2014in my opinion you better NOT\nbelieve this , as it has the support of DIET COKE , a powerful lobby. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Diet Coke is bad for\ntype 2 diabetes. &nbsp;I can bet in the very\nnear future nobody will buy Diet Coke. It is best to stick to organic natural\nfoods and natural sweeteners like honey .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Artificial sweeteners\nslow metabolism and increase fat deposition, and can increase the risk of\ndiabetes. Insulin normally triggers the liver to take up extra blood glucose\nand store the energy for future use. &nbsp;But\nwhen the liver is submerged in fat tissue, insulin can't get the liver to\nrespond.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While any excess fat cranks\nup the risk of diabetes, fat in your midsection\u2014which tends to swaddle organs\nthat play a key role in regulating blood sugar\u2014is a bigger contributor to risk.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I keep a packet of\ncinnamon stick in my car. &nbsp;It prevents type\n2 diabetes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soluble fiber turns\ninto a gel-like consistency during digestion, which slows absorption of the\nsugar molecules in the starch. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soluble fiber is the\npart of the plant material which absorbs water and dissolves in the digestive\nsystem. Oat bran, barley, legumes and fruit are high in soluble fiber. This\nfiber also works to moderate blood glucose, reduce cholesterol, triglycerides\nand lower LDL cholesterol.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lGw7KlgueP4/Uq025y1jB-I/AAAAAAAAoUM/pFsIo_gHeGM/s1600/downluygtyuoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lGw7KlgueP4/Uq025y1jB-I/AAAAAAAAoUM/pFsIo_gHeGM/s400/downluygtyuoad.jpg\" height=\"334\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insoluble fiber passes\nthrough the digestive tract without \"registering\" as a carbohydrate,\nwhile slowing down the whole digestive process so you stay satisfied and your\nblood sugar remains steady.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insoluble fiber is\nroughage\u2013bran, skins and seeds, vegetables and cereal. This kind of fiber\npromotes regularity by adding bulk to bowel movements, slows digestion to aid\nin weight loss and blood glucose control, and helps prevent intestinal\ndisorders and reduces the risk of intestinal cancers.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-C-XH_1xVhd0/Uq03OezN8QI/AAAAAAAAoUU/o8H1boH_Q3E/s1600/TabjgvuleFiber1Jan-10.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-C-XH_1xVhd0/Uq03OezN8QI/AAAAAAAAoUU/o8H1boH_Q3E/s640/TabjgvuleFiber1Jan-10.jpg\" height=\"484\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eating white rice can\nraise blood glucose significantly, especially if eaten often or in large\nquantities.&nbsp; Potatoes may be a whole,\nnatural root veggie, but they\u2019re also notorious for causing blood sugar to\nspike because they're digested into the bloodstream quickly. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Glucose (sugar) is a carbohydrate. Because\ncontrolling blood sugar controls diabetes, be wary of the amount of carbohydrate\nintake. &nbsp;Beer is like sugar laden dessert\nas far as diabetes is concerned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gQ_g5P0UKoc/Uq01T8IiVcI/AAAAAAAAoT4/yVwpfDmQj_Q/s1600/kisvfdszdney.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gQ_g5P0UKoc/Uq01T8IiVcI/AAAAAAAAoT4/yVwpfDmQj_Q/s640/kisvfdszdney.jpg\" height=\"426\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Healthy kidneys do not\nallow a significant amount of protein to pass through their filters. &nbsp;But\nfilters damaged by kidney disease may let proteins such as albumin leak from\nthe blood into the urine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Faulty kidneys allow\nthe passage of protein from the blood to the urine, which causes froth. </b>Those\nwho have hypertension (high blood pressure) and diabetes have a greater chance\nof seeing bubbles in their urine .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When blood circulates through healthy kidneys,\na system of tubules, called glomeruli, filter out waste products and leave\nbehind substances your body needs, including proteins.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the kidneys are\ndamaged, proteins may reach detectable levels in the urine.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9cQM-zHypAk/Uq01fcf206I/AAAAAAAAoUA/HT76Sqx8qOg/s1600/diabetes-andsbd-kidney.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9cQM-zHypAk/Uq01fcf206I/AAAAAAAAoUA/HT76Sqx8qOg/s640/diabetes-andsbd-kidney.png\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Glomerulosclerosis\nrefers to scarring or hardening of the glomeruli -- blood vessels located in\nthe kidneys. The glomeruli filter the blood as it passes through the kidneys.\nThey remove waste fluids that then leave the body as urine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Damaged glomeruli can't\nperform their job adequately. As a result, large amounts of protein from the\nblood leak into the urine rather than remaining in the bloodstream. This leads\nto a condition called proteinuria.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/QEiFccOwJbo/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/QEiFccOwJbo&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/QEiFccOwJbo&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ketone is a chemical\nproduced when there is a shortage of insulin in the blood and the body breaks\ndown body fat for energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-g2cW61NtttM/Uq04pbklgpI/AAAAAAAAoUg/ZUrBlixZ37Q/s1600/f4-u1.0-B978-1-41trfju60-2805-5..50252-4..gr1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ketones in the urine is\na sign that your body is using fat for energy instead of using glucose because\nnot enough insulin is available to use glucose for energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ketones are produced\nnormally by the liver as part of fatty acid metabolism. In normal states these\nketones will be completely metabolised so that very little, if any at all, will\nappear in the urine. If for any reason the body cannot get enough glucose for\nenergy it will switch to using body fats, resulting in an increase in ketone\nproduction making them detectable in the blood and urine.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YvjNBWvaDOQ/Uq07a0vMsoI/AAAAAAAAoVM/6vJSXppu6QU/s1600/ketonesproductionpg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YvjNBWvaDOQ/Uq07a0vMsoI/AAAAAAAAoVM/6vJSXppu6QU/s640/ketonesproductionpg.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"602\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When your cells don't\nget the glucose they need for energy, your body begins to burn fat for energy,\nwhich produces ketones. They are a warning sign that your diabetes is out of\ncontrol or that you are getting sick. High levels of ketones can poison the\nbody. Ketones accumulate in the blood, causing it to become more acidic.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a\nresult, many of the enzymes that control the body's metabolic processes aren't\nable to function as well. A higher level of ketones also affects levels of\nsugar and electrolytes in the body.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f_HJFIr6SsE/Uq05URqhRKI/AAAAAAAAoUo/pxiLdNr3DY0/s1600/322021761_950.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f_HJFIr6SsE/Uq05URqhRKI/AAAAAAAAoUo/pxiLdNr3DY0/s320/322021761_950.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"241\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When ketone levels\nbecome too high, the risk of ketoacidosis is raised, and this emergency\ncondition can lead to coma and even death in serious cases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High levels of ketones\nare therefore more common in people with type 1 diabetes or people with\nadvanced type 2 diabetes. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Like I said\nbefore Ketones are an acid remaining when the body burns its own fat, when there is NO insulin or not enough insulin .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Glycosuria or\nglucosuria is the excretion of glucose into the urine. Ordinarily, urine\ncontains no glucose because the kidneys are able to reclaim all of the filtered\nglucose back into the bloodstream.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cataracts and glaucoma\nare also more common among diabetics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kidney damage from\ndiabetes is called diabetic nephropathy. &nbsp;The onset of kidney disease and its\nprogression is extremely variable. &nbsp;Initially,\ndiseased small blood vessels in the kidneys cause the leakage of protein in the\nurine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Later on, the kidneys\nlose their ability to cleanse and filter blood. &nbsp;The accumulation of toxic waste products in\nthe blood leads to the need for expensive dialysis. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dialysis involves using\na machine that serves the function of the kidney by filtering and cleaning the\nblood. &nbsp;In patients who do not want to\nundergo chronic EXPENSIVE dialysis, kidney transplantation is the only way out. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">May the universal form,\nexalted among the Vedas and born of the essence of the Vedas, bless me with\nwisdom. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">May I be blessed with\nthe nectar of immortality. May my body become active. May my tongue speak\nsweetly. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">May my ears hear\neverything well. You are the repository of Brahman, and are hidden by the\nintellect. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">May my memory protect\nme. Om peace, peace, peace.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">O goddess of wisdom!\nYou are pleased, all-pervading and have a peaceful mind. Bless us so that we\nmay give up bad speech and speak well in an assembly like heroes.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">O goddess! Blessed by\nyou one becomes a sage; like Brahma. Blessed by you one attains prosperity.\nBlessed by you one attains many treasures. May that intelligence bless us with\nwealth.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">May Indra give me\nintelligence. May goddess Saraswati give me intelligence. May the two Ashwins,\nwho wear garlands of lotuses give me intelligence.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">May Saraswati, who is\nfragrant, bless me with the divine intelligence which is the wisdom of the\nApsaras and the mind of the Gandharvas.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">May that Saraswati, who\nis intelligence personified, who is fragrant, who is all pervading, who has a\ngolden complexion, who is the earth, who is accessible to all, who is full of\nvigour, who is overflowing with the nectar of knowledge, and who is beautiful;\ncome to me and bless me with intelligence.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">May Agni give me\nintelligence, people and vigour. May Indra give me intelligence, people and\nbodily power. May Surya give me intelligence, people and brilliance.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">We perceive the Hamsa\nthat is the soul; we meditate on that Hamsa that is the supreme being.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">May that Hamsa inspire\nus (to reach that goal).<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Om peace, peace</span>,&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mt07TInq0YQ/Uq2nwmIrmPI/AAAAAAAAoWA/TvUnSFr7Vto/s1600/10122013846.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mt07TInq0YQ/Uq2nwmIrmPI/AAAAAAAAoWA/TvUnSFr7Vto/s320/10122013846.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"218\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Chanan chanan teri\nnobat bajay<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Ho chanan chanan teri\nnobat bajay<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Naal waje gharyal bhala\njhoolay lalan<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Ho naal waje gharyal\nbhala jhoolay lalan<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Sindhri da, sehwan da,\nsakhi shahbaz kalandar<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Dama dam mast kalandar<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Dama dam mast kalandar<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Dama dam mast kalandar<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Ho laal meri, ho laal\nmeri</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">###############</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">O lord of Sindh, Jhulelal, and Sire of Shewan <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The red robed God-intoxicated Qalandar, glory unto you! <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">May I always have your benign protection <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Your shrine is always lighted with four lamps <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">And here I come to light a fifth lamp in your honor <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Let your heroic name ring out in Hind &amp; Sindh <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Let the bell ring loud for your glory <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">O Lord, may you prevail everytime, everywhere <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">In the name of Ali, I pray to you to help my boat cross <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">(the river of life) in safety</span></i><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Khatri caste Hindu\nsaint Guru Nanak died&nbsp; in September 22,\n1539 at the age of &nbsp;70 at Kartapur Ravi,\nPakistan , the Muslims fought for his dead body.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tW5dFkkjsEc/UqdNnkj-3DI/AAAAAAAAoPI/_wVET-LDpqk/s1600/dowdegjnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Muslims who were in power &nbsp;claimed that since Nanak went to Mecca &nbsp;the saint belongs to their faith. &nbsp;&nbsp;Finally\nthey found the body was missing, with a basket of flowers in its place. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9X5R2c2BRW0/UqdNTJaX3tI/AAAAAAAAoPA/4s7M4JGpLws/s1600/dowfr4enload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They divided the flowers and buried half of\nit, while the other half was cremated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why blame the Sindhis. &nbsp;They are the modern gypsies. &nbsp;They do NOT have a homeland. &nbsp;They are ridiculed in Bollywood movies &nbsp;( papad ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their homeland in\nPakistan , the Sindh , was the spot of the most ancient civilization of\nmankind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The story of Guru Nanak\nand the flowers , was written by the British.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Brits just copied\nfrom Jhulelal's history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Jhulelal died at\nthe age of 13 there was a fight between Muslims and Sindhi Hindus, as to how\nthey would dispose off the dead carcass. &nbsp;The story of the flowers being divided\nhappened with Jhulelal, NOT with Nanak.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the song Harzat\nShahbaaz Qalandar is also referred as Jhulelal. &nbsp;Both are NOT the same. &nbsp;One is a Sufi Muslim who died at the age of 94\n, the other is a Hindu boy saint saint Jhulelal, &nbsp;who died more than a hundred and ten years before . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">See how history is\nwarped by a mere song writer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jhulelal had saved the Sindhis\nfrom sure death at the hand of the evil Muslim ruler Mirkshah \u2013who told them \"convert or die\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In so transpired that Mirkshah\nbecame his believer. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When he was about to kill Jhulelal, there was a sort of a\ntsunami ,when water entered his palace and fires broke out at the same\ntime.&nbsp; The Muslim king begged for\nforegiveness and the rising waters receded like magic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\">Today none of the Sindhis know about a brave and righteous Sindhi Hindu ruler by the name of Raja Dahir. &nbsp;However a few Sindhis still remember him with gratitude and celebrate June 20 to remember the virtuous Raja Dahir of Chuch Dynasty .</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kR9yDteDHTY/UqiMTCnPbXI/AAAAAAAAoP0/sVwW5CZ6_P0/s1600/Raja_dahir.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kR9yDteDHTY/UqiMTCnPbXI/AAAAAAAAoP0/sVwW5CZ6_P0/s640/Raja_dahir.jpg\" width=\"502\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\">There is a saying among the white men \" First give a dog a bad name and then shoot it \" .</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\">This is what the Muslim historians did. They gave Raja Dahir the last Hindu ruler of Sindh who ruled for 32 long years , a bad name. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\">They charged this Pushkarna Brahmin king with marrying his own sister. No Hindu will EVER marry his own sister \u2013this is just a big muslim lie..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\">They did propaganda that he raped a virgin from his kingdom every night. So to save the Sindhi Hindus &nbsp;( SNIFF ! ) from such tyranny, Muhammad bin Qasim (an Arab general) from the Umayyad Caliphate, waged war and killed him in 712 AD .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Below: Muhammad Bin Qasim</b></span></i></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
